MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. It has necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00am. This is to safely carry out repairs on our electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:25am on Wednesday, 04 November 2020.
